long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
│ Refresh, Reload, Repeat │

This extension aims to automate your experience of refreshing sites when waiting for them to return online or change. Simply press "Start" on the tab and let the extension refresh the site until its content changes. You can leave the tab and let the extension do the work. Does not function on multiple tabs but if you press stop and then start on a new tab then it will start working on the new tab (sometimes a manual refresh of the site for the first time is required).  

»│Operation:
   » Functions by taking the hash of the source code
   » Site is then refreshed and a new hash is taken
   » Comparison is made and if they are the same then process repeats 
* Whilst this is effective for a site that is static or down as no content is changing can be useful for maintenance or development *

»│Supported websites:
    » All (Accessible to extension, i.e. not local files or other extension pages)

»│Permission breakdown:
    » Access to tabs so that it can refresh the page on that tab
    » No data is recorded or used
